connector.description:
Send messages to Google Cloud Pub/Sub.

You must encode the `serviceAccountKey` property before you pass it as a parameter.

camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.project.name: camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.projectId
camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.project.description: The Google Cloud Pub/Sub Project ID.

camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.service.name: camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.serviceAccountKey
camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-sink.service.description: The service account key to use as credentials for the Pub/Sub publisher/subscriber. You must encode this value in base64.
